movies.title: Kamikaze: Le dernier assaut
movies.plot: 26 year old Kentaro discovers his biological grandfather died as a kamikaze pilot during WW2. He and his sister begin an investigation into what kind of person he was, interviewing men who fought with him. There follows the story of Japanese Navy Air Service Platoon Sergeant Miyabe, as told by four of the men who knew him best. Intricately woven the film follows him through Pearl Harbor, the Midway Battle and the Battle for Okinawa. When he finally loses his will and respect for life he enrolls in the Special Attack Force and passes his responsibility to return to his wife and infant daughter on to a younger pilot. An engaging tale of a man brave enough to challenge accepted ways of thinking.
movies.simplePlot: A young woman and her brother explore the history of their grandfather, who died in the WW2. They start contacting the m'en who flew with him, asking them about who he was.

biography.bio: He's a singer of the Jpop group V6 (6 members) since 1995 at the age of 14 years (the year of creation). This group are two subgroups: 20th Century (the seniors of them) and Coming Century (the juniors, and Okada's subgroup). He's the most younger of them. He's too a three martial arts instructor, with license. He play's piano and guitar.
biography.name: Jun'ichi Okada

biography.bio: Haruma Miura is a Japanese actor and singer. He is part of the Amuse agency, and debuted as one of the members of Brash Brats, a J-pop group. However, they are on hiatus, while Haruma is still active as an actor. He gained popularity with Gokusen 3 and 2007 film Koizora. He starred for the first time with a leading role in drama based on manga, Bloody Monday. He was cast in the movie Negative Happy Chainsaw Edge starring Hayato Ichihara. In 2008, he starred opposite Juri Ueno in Naoko and won the Sponichi Grand Prix Newcomer Award in the 63rd Mainichi Film Awards in 2009 for his role. He also was given a newcomer award in the 31st Japan Academy Awards on February 15, 2008. Miura soon gained recognition following several dramas such as Fight. During this time, Brash Brats went on hiatus, while Miura continued his acting career.
biography.name: Haruma Miura

biography.bio: Mao Inoue was born on January 9, 1987 in Yokohama, Kanagawa, Japan. She is an actress, known for I Give My First Love to You (2009), Rebirth (2011) and The Snow White Murder Case (2014).
biography.name: Mao Inoue

biography.bio: Gaku Hamada was born on June 28, 1988 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Sake-Bomb (2013), Miss Hokusai (2015) and Kamikaze: Le dernier assaut (2013). He has been married to Miyuki Koizumi since July 2011.
biography.name: Gaku Hamada

biography.bio: Hirofumi Arai was born on January 18, 1979 in Hirosaki, Japan as Kyung-Sik Park. He is an actor, known for Confessions (2010), Blood and Bones (2004) and Go (2001).
biography.name: Hirofumi Arai

biography.bio: Shôta Sometani was born on September 3, 1992 in Japan. He is an actor, known for Themis (2011), Parasyte: Part 1 (2014) and Les enfants loups, Ame & Yuki (2012). He has been married to Rinko Kikuchi since December 31, 2014.
biography.name: Shôta Sometani

biography.bio: Born in Tokyo to a family of celebrities, Miura's father is actor Tomokazu Miura, his mother is singer and actress Momoe Yamaguchi, his older brother is singer and actor Yutaro Miura and he is also the cousin of Kenta Itogi. Miura is a good swimmer who is trained as a lifeguard. He made the decision to become an actor just before graduating from Juntendo University in Tokyo
biography.name: Takahiro Miura

biography.bio: Tatsuya Ueda was born on October 4, 1983 in Yokohama, Kanagawa, Japan. He is an actor, known for Kamikaze: Le dernier assaut (2013), Boys on the Run (2012) and Konkatsu! (2009).
biography.name: Tatsuya Ueda

biography.bio: Ken Aoki is an actor, known for Kano (2014), Kamikaze: Le dernier assaut (2013) and Crows Zero II (2009).
biography.name: Ken Aoki

biography.bio: Rakuto Tochihara is an actor, known for Kamikaze: Le dernier assaut (2013), Junjô (2010) and Nana et Kaoru (2011).
biography.name: Rakuto Tochihara

biography.bio: Ippei Sasaki is an actor, known for Kamikaze: Le dernier assaut (2013), Space Battleship Yamato (2010) and Beyond Outrage (2012).
biography.name: Ippei Sasaki

biography.bio: Yûya Endô was born on March 20, 1987. He is an actor, known for Ain't No Tomorrows (2008), Kamikaze: Le dernier assaut (2013) and Jubunairu (2000).
biography.name: Yûya Endô

biography.bio: Takehiro was born in Japan as a son of an actor's family. Both of his parents are well-known actors in Japan. Takehiro went to high school and college in the U.S.. He received a bachelor's degree from Brown University in the class of '97. He has appeared in a numerous productions of television dramas, films and theatre. He native language is Japanese, but his proficiency in English is notable.
biography.name: Takehiro Hira

biography.bio: Tarô Suruga is an actor, known for Her Love Boils Bathwater (2016), Kamikaze: Le dernier assaut (2013) and Welcome to Fortune Telling Onmyo Shop (2013).
biography.name: Tarô Suruga

biography.bio: Toshihiro Yashiba was born on October 2, 1971 in Soka, Japan. He is an actor, known for Shuriken Sentai Ninninger (2015), Space Battleship Yamato (2010) and Kamikaze: Le dernier assaut (2013).
biography.name: Toshihiro Yashiba

camera: Red Epic, Zeiss Master Prime and Angenieux Optimo Lenses
